title: Ergonomics

# Workstation Recommendations

<ul>
    <li>Monitor should be 18-28 inches away (arms length from screen)</li>
    <li>Monitor screen top slightly below eye level</li>
    <li>Elbows bent 90&deg of flexion;, wrist in neutral and free while typing</li>
    <li>Use a mouse that contours the hand</li>
    <li>Thighs horizontal and feet resting flat on floor</li>
    <li>Space under the desk should be at least 30 inches wide, 19 inches deep, 25- 34 inches in height, should be 2-3 inches between the top of the thighs and desk</li>
</ul>
